title: low priority queue is ridiculous
body: people shouldn't be able to grief you, then refuse to let you surrender. why are you putting power in the griefers hands? if i don't let them hi-jack my time, they'll report me putting me into this bullshit low-priority queue? you know your game isn't really good enough for this type of non-sense, people can just play something else.

replies.body:
You're too preoccupied with justice. And you're never going to get it here. Learn to deny these people what they want - attention. Mute everyone, say nothing, and play as if this is all normal. 

You don't kill trolls, you starve them.
Well if you don't think the game is up to your standards then go and play something else.

If you allowed people to leave games then games with 5 people on both teams at the end of the game would be a very rare sight.

When you queue up for a game of LoL you are promising your time until the end of the game to your team and to Riot. If you don't want to do that then go play a different game.
If it isnt good enough then go play something else then. Your plee on the boards isnt gonna help
